content: Construct a sentence with every word starting with a single letter of the alphabet, starting with x and going in reverse order.

Xylophones waltz vivaciously under tranquil skies, rhythmically queuing past ornate nymphs, molding languid kisses just in hushy gardens, forever ebbing dusk's chaotic blues, amid serene nights, melancholy lingers, kissing jesters' invitations, hauntingly grave echo.
